text.section: Subject to KRS 272A.1-110 and the articles of association, bylaws may contain any other provision for managing and regulating the affairs of the association.

In addition to amendments permitted under Subchapter 4 of this chapter, the initial board of directors may amend the bylaws by a majority vote of the directors at any time before the admission of members.

law.history: Created 2012 Ky. Acts ch. 160, sec. 22, effective July 12, 2012.
